programme.title: Take Shelter
programme.desc: Cannesissa palkitussa elokuvassa ohiolainen Curtis viettaa rauhallista elamaa vaimonsa ja kuuron tyttarensa kanssa, mutta nakee piinaavan todentuntuisia enneunia uhkaavasta myrskysta. Mielenterveyttaan epaillen mies hakeutuu laakarin puheille, mutta unien jatkuessa han alkaa varautua vanhaa maanalaista myrskysuojaa parantelemalla. Onko puhuri sittenkaan todella tulossa ja tarvitseeko Curtisin perhe lopulta suojaa myrskytuulilta vai Curtisilta itseltaan?

programme.title: Varg
programme.desc: Varg on elamaa suurempi tarina Ruotsin ja Norjan rajalla asuvasta Klemensista (Peter Stomare) ja taman sisarenpojasta, Nejlasta.

programme.title: Boys on the Side
programme.desc: Vauhdikkaassa komediassa kolme naista tekee vahingossa rikoksen ja joutuu lahtemaan karkuteille. Naiset lahtevat taipaleelle koko maan halki, ja matkan aikana he kokevat jotain heille ennalta tuntematonta: yhteenkuuluvuuden tunnetta ja ystavyytta.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: Dont Come Knocking
programme.desc: Hollywood-tahti Howard Spence (Sam Shepard) on nahnyt parempiakin paivia, mutta nyt han ratsastaa vain menneella maineellaan. Jalleen yhden irstailuillan jalkeen han pakenee uuden lankkarin kuvauksista ja ratsastaa preerialle kuin yksi sankareista, joita han on niin usein naytellyt. Han etsii suojaa aitinsa (Eva Marie Saint) luota, jota han ei ole nahnyt vuosiin. Tosin siellakaan han ei viivy kauan saatuaan tietaa, etta hanella saattaa olla poika, josta han ei ole tiennyt. Howardille tama tuo toivoa siita, ettei hanen elamansa ole ollutkaan taysin turhaa. Ehka jossain on paikka, jonne han kuuluu.

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Jimmy P.
programme.desc: Huolestunut Amerikan alkuperaisasukas muodostaa poikkeuksellisen ystavyyden ranskalaisen psykoanalyytikon kanssa, kun he yrittavat loytaa parannuskeinon karsimykselleen.

programme.title: Varastetut lapset
programme.desc: Kolme puoliksi valkoihoista ja puoliksi aboriginaalia tyttoa koulutetaan tyoskentelemaan kotiapulaisina valkoisissa perheissa ja heita valmistellaan menemaan naimisiin valkoihoisten miesten kanssa. Mutta tytot paattavat paeta, ja he lahtevat seuraamaan yli 1 500 mailin pituista osavaltion raja-aitaa mullistavassa seikkailussa Australian eramaassa.

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: On Aika Tappaa
programme.desc: Elokuvan ohjaaja on Joel Schumacher (Batman Forever, Paamies). Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Matchew McConaughey ja Kevin Spacey esittavat paaosia murhaoikeudenkaynnissa, joka nostaa pienen mississippilaiskaupungin rotujannitteet valokeilaan. Aktivistimarssien, Ku Kluz Klanin hirmuvallan, mediarummutuksen ja vakivaltaisten mellakoiden keskella kokematon, mutta idealistinen nuori asianajaja jarjestaa aj atuksia herattavan oikeussalitaistelun oikeuden puolesta. Loisteliaasseen nayttelijakaartiin kuuluvat myos Breda Fricker, Oliver Platt, CharlesS. Dutton, Ashley Judd, Patrick McGoohan, Chris Cooper ja seka Donald etta Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Winged Creatures
programme.desc: Tavallinen paiva tavallisessa ravintolassa Los Angelesissa. Rauha rikkoutuu silmanrapayksessa, kun psykopaatti astelee sisaan ravintolaan, ottaa aseen esiin ja alkaa ampua eparoimatta ympariinsa. Osa ihmisista kuolee. Henkiinjaaneet yrittavat ymmartaa mita on tapahtunut, ja miten elamalle saa taas uuden merkityksen ja turvallisuuden tunteen.

programme.title: Rules Dont Apply
programme.desc: Hollywoodissa vuonna 1958 nayttelijattaren (Lily Collins) ja hanen autonkuljettajansa (Alden Ehrenreich) valinen vetovoima koettelee heidan uskonnollista vakaumustaan ja uhmaa heidan pomonsa Howard Hughesin (Warren Beatty) saantoa, joka kieltaa heita tapailemasta. Beattyn ohjaaman (ja Beattyn ja Bo Goldmanin kasikirjoittaman) draamakomedian tahtia ovat myos Annette Bening ja Matthew Broderick.

programme.title: Wicker Park
programme.desc: Matthew och Lisa ar oskiljaktiga. Deras passionerade karlek går inte att ta miste på. Men så plotsligt forsvinner hon- lamnar honom utan ett ord- och Matthews varld rasar samman. Nu, två år senare, har Matthew borjat komma over den varsta saknaden. Men nar han plotsligt får vad han tror ar en skymt av henne i folkvimlet ar det som att han blivit traffad av blixten- han måste få se henne. Efter ett intensivt letande hittar han henne. Tror han. For nar smartan och begaret blir for stort kan den forvranga dina sinnesbilder.

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.title: JFK - Avoin tapaus
programme.desc: New Orleansin piirisyyttaja Jim Garrison ottaa tehtavakseen tutkia presidentti John F. Kennedyn murhaa Dallasissa, Texasissa vuonna 1963. Se, mita han saa selville, saa hanet epailemaan, etta tarinassa on muutakin kuin julkisuuden versio.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Kesahetket (Summer Hours)
programme.desc: Helène on suvun matriarkka, joka on omistanut elamansa taiteen ja antiikkiesineiden keraamiselle. Kun hanen elamansa lopulta paattyy, hanen kolme lastaan saavat suuren perinnon kauniin vanhan maalaistalon ja kaiken siihen kuuluvan muodossa, mutta lapset ovat kaikkea muuta kuin yhta mielta siita, miten perintokohteita tulisi hallita. Kesahetket on Kultainen palmu -voittaja Olivier Assayasin vakeva perhedraama, jonka rooleissa nahdaan Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling ja Jeremie Renier.

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: Paamies
programme.desc: Eras poika nakee mafia-asianajajan murhan ja saa tietaa salaisuuden, jota suojatakseen roistot ovat valmiit tappamaan.

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America - Suuri gangsterisota
programme.desc: Tarina kahdesta New Yorkista kotoisin olevasta lapsuudenystavasta, joista tulee varakkaita ja vaikutusvaltaisia gangstereita 1920-luvun aikana. Kumpikaan ei kykene tyydyttamaan syvimpia haaveitaan tai himojaan, ja heidan tiensa erkanevat rajahtavan vakivaltaisesti tavalla, josta selviaa totuus vasta 35 vuotta myohemmin.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Kesahetket (Summer Hours)
programme.desc: Helène on suvun matriarkka, joka on omistanut elamansa taiteen ja antiikkiesineiden keraamiselle. Kun hanen elamansa lopulta paattyy, hanen kolme lastaan saavat suuren perinnon kauniin vanhan maalaistalon ja kaiken siihen kuuluvan muodossa, mutta lapset ovat kaikkea muuta kuin yhta mielta siita, miten perintokohteita tulisi hallita. Kesahetket on Kultainen palmu -voittaja Olivier Assayasin vakeva perhedraama, jonka rooleissa nahdaan Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling ja Jeremie Renier.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven put his GLORY world heavyweight title on the line against number one contender ‘The Prince’ Levi Rigters in a hotly anticipated rematch from their GLORY Grand Prix final earlier this year. GLORY light heavyweight world champion Tarik Khbabez will collide with Donegi Abena in a trilogy fight to end their heated rivalry in the co-main event.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 98 features the highly anticipated return of Jamal Ben Saddik (36-9, 29 KO) against the Estonian powerhouse Uku Jurjendal (20-9, 16 KO). In the co-main event of the evening, GLORY Welterweight World Champion Chico Kwasi (43-5-1, 23 KO) is set to defend his title against number two ranked welterweight Teodor Hristov (18-3, 7 KO). Meanwhile, two of 2024’s best prospects will clash as Cem Caceres (18-1, 14 KO) faces Mory Kromah (31-2-1, 18 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 99: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: The year-long, five-event tournament kicks off at GLORY 99 in Rotterdam Ahoy, featuring 32 heavyweights in 16 bouts on a mega all-heavyweight card.

programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Over the course of a year, twelve of the best GLORY featherweights will compete opposite twelve of the best RISE featherweights in a series of knockout bouts until one fighter becomes the Last Featherweight Standing.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 100 Last Heavyweight Standing
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Balkans have made a remarkable recovery considering how recently they were a war-torn part of the world, and now attract large numbers of tourists each year.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Extremadura region was where the Romans first introduced carp to Spain, and this rugged area now has a reputation for producing some massive ones from the huge lakes.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Croatia has emerged as probably the best place in the world to go and catch a huge carp and will soon be producing fish in excess of 100lb, likely to break the World record.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The intrepid trio travel to Slovenia, a country none of them have ever been to before, to fish two very different waters.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: In a first for Monster Carp, and as a result of the Covid-19 travel restrictions, Ali, Neil and Tom stay at home in the UK, but that doesnt prevent them from going in search of some very large carp.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Kicks off at a lake called Carces, as Ali, Tom and Neil embark on a Tour of France around the country in search of some of the huge carp that it is famous for.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: A visit to a complex of lakes, near Reims, which is fished by hundreds of anglers from the UK each year and is one of the most popular holiday venues in the country - Crete Lakes.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: A picturesque lake in the middle of forest land, a couple of hours drive from Paris, which is known as Iles3 and is home to some very special common carp.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Graviers Lake once held the world record for carp and is still home to some huge fish today, so it made sense that the final leg paid this famous water, near Dijon, a visit.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Heading to The Land of the Rising Sun for the ultimate angling adventure, the jovial, carping mad Ali Hamidi is joined by angling pals in a quest to discover Japans legendary carp.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: In an action-packed angling adventure in Central Europe, crazy guy Ali Hamidi is joined by fellow carp fanatics Neil Spooner and Tom Dove as they tackle the mighty Lake Balaton.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: In a rollercoaster journey across breath-taking Italian lakes and rivers, fanatical carp crusader Ali Hamidi is joined by close friends as they say "ciao" to the mighty monster carp of Italy.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: With some very high scoring fish dishes in the regional heats the chefs will need perform at their best today

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The competition is fierce, and as the barbecues are fired up all 8 chefs are feeling the heat.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Michel Roux jr on Bread / Hairy Bikers on Cauliflower
programme.desc: Michel Roux Jr gets passionate about the lost art of baking bread. He sets out to discover the secrets behind artisan bread and shares his own recipes and The Hairy Bikers bang the drum for the revival of the British cauliflower.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 James Martin on Apples / Matt Tebbutt on Mutton
programme.desc: Chef and proud Yorkshireman James Martin takes on the challenge of reviving the British apple and Matt Tebutt leads the charge on behalf of mutton.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Ainsley Harriott on Honey / Glynn Purnell on Cheese
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott shows off his sweet side as he starts a campaign for the revival of British honey and Michelin starred chef and Great British Menu favourite Glynn Purnell rides to the rescue of British cheese.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Gary Rhodes on Tomatoes / Angela Hartnett on Crab
programme.desc: Gary Rhodes wants us all to appreciate the virtues of the British tomato and Michelin-starred chef Angela Hartnett attempts to find her sea legs when she delves into why crab is so unloved in Britain.

programme.title: Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: Bespectacled bounty hunter Stan Ross arrives in Canyon City after a bank robbery and uncovers a web of corruption. Hired by banker Jefferson to hunt Mexican bandits, Stan learns the bandits were falsely accused and once worked with Jefferson. As Stan digs deeper, he faces betrayal, hidden alliances, and a dangerous grip on the city.

programme.title: Kill the Wickeds
programme.desc: Good Samaritan drifter, Benny Hudson and a stranded woman, Jenny finds themselves being torture; when they accidentally walk into an gangs hideout in a ghost town.

programme.title: The Cariboo Trail
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canadas British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: The Hired Hand
programme.desc: Harry returns home to his wife and farm after drifting with his friend Arch and has to make a difficult decision regarding his loyalties.

programme.title: $1,000 on the Black
programme.desc: Twelve years ago, Sartana framed his brother Johnny for murder and stole his girlfriend. Now the towns undisputed boss and doted over by his possessive mother, Sartana seems safe - until, his sentence served, Johnny rides back into town.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E21-24
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Three Ruthless Ones
programme.desc: The Walker brothers - one a criminal, another a U.S. Marshal, and the third a wealthy rancher - share a lifelong goal: to avenge their father’s murder, witnessed as children. When they finally track down the killer, their clashing ideals lead to a dramatic and inevitable showdown, testing family bonds and justice itself.

programme.title: Molly And Lawless John
programme.desc: In New Mexico, a sheriffs unhappy mid-aged wife aids a condemned prisoner escape her husbands jail and elopes with the young and attractive outlaw to Mexico, pursued by the sheriffs posse.

programme.title: Keoma
programme.desc: A half-breed ex-Union gunfighter attempts to protect his plague-ridden hometown from being overridden by his racist half-brothers and a Confederate tyrant.

programme.title: Django Meets Sartana
programme.desc: The small desert town of Black City is held in a reign of terror by a nasty gang of criminals lead by the ruthless Bud Willer.

programme.title: Five Guns West
programme.desc: Shalee Jethro (Dorothy Malone) helps her father run a desert stagecoach station.

programme.title: The Daring Caballero
programme.desc: Cisco learns that Pappy Del Rio, the towns leading citizen, is set to be hanged for murder. The Padre believes Pappy is innocent, so Cisco breaks him out and hides him. While on the run, Cisco encounters the Mayor, an outlaw he knows under a new name, and suspects hes the real murderer. Cisco sets out to prove the Mayor’s guilt and clear Pappy’s name.

programme.title: Gunfight at Red Sands
programme.desc: An avenging outsider riddles a gang of ruthless bandits in revenge for the murder of his family.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: When a sudden spurt of murders occurs in Texas Big Bend country, suspicion immediately falls on a young drifter who just moved to the area.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Colorized American Western Movie from 1946 starring Randolph Scott: Abilene Town - A sheriff tries to stop homesteader conflicts in the West after the Civil War.

programme.title: Dynamite Jim
programme.desc: Union soldiers must transport Mexican gold across dangerous terrain—but greedy outlaws, a corrupt banker, and the explosive outlaw Dynamite Jim are hot on their trail. What begins as a mission of duty turns into a high-stakes showdown filled with ambushes, betrayals, and blazing gunfights.

programme.title: Day of Anger
programme.desc: Bank robbery pulled off by the bank officials, not the usual James gang.

programme.title: Man, Pride and Vengeance
programme.desc: A stalwart Spanish soldier turns to a life of crime to prove his love for a mysterious and promiscuous gypsy woman.

programme.title: Long Days of Hate
programme.desc: A bounty, Benson is hunting down a vicious outlaw gang, who killed his parents, brother and sisters, except for one sister, Susy, who he wants for himself!

programme.title: I Am Sartana, Trade Your Guns for a Coffin
programme.desc: Sartana, a bounty hunter and gunfighter, witnesses a gold robbery and arrives in a suspicious town run by Samuel Spencer. Hired to protect the next shipment, Sartana fends off numerous incompetent villains, surviving their attempts on his life. Meanwhile, his nemesis, Sabbath—known for his white coat and parasol—arrives in town. With tensions rising, Sartana and Sabbath are headed for a final showdown to settle the score.

programme.title: Garden of Evil
programme.desc: A trio of American adventurers stranded in rural Mexico are recruited by a beautiful woman to rescue her husband, who is trapped in a cave in Apache territory.

programme.title: The Covered Wagon
programme.desc: Two wagon caravans converge at what is now Kansas City, and combine for the westward push to Oregon. On their quest the pilgrims will experience desert heat, mountain snow, hunger, and indian attack.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: Ted Hayden impersonates a wanted man and joins Gentrys gang only to learn later that Gentry was the one who killed his father. He saves Virginia Winters dads ranch from Gentry and also rescues his long-lost brother Spud.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The state government plans to build a flood-control dam and condemns the property of the local farmers and ranchers, including The Three Mesquiteers. The state intends to compensate the land-owners fairly, but a crooked real-estate promoter complicates things. The ranchers, led by Stony Brooke (John Wayne (q)), Tucson Smith (Ray Corrigan) and Rusty Joslin (Raymond Hatton) fight back against both the law and the crooks.

programme.title: Shango
programme.desc: Shango is a Texas Ranger who finds himself up against a former Confederate officer and his gang of thugs who have been terrorizing a local border town in search of gold.

programme.title: Hannie Caulder
programme.desc: After she is raped by the trio of outlaw brothers who murdered her husband, a frontierswoman hires a bounty hunter to instruct her in the use of a gun so she can exact her revenge.

programme.title: Minnesota Clay
programme.desc: In 1883, Clay, a gunfighter with health problems, is wrongfully imprisoned in Drunner Labor Camp. He was framed by Fox, the corrupt sheriff of Mesa Encantada. Fox now extorts the towns people, running a violent protection racket. Clay, determined to clear his name, is approached by bandit Ortiz, who wants him to kill Fox.

programme.title: Showdown At Williams Creek
programme.desc: A British soldier decides to move to the American frontier and start a new life. He finds the frontier tough and struggles with the climate, thieves and swindlers. He is accused of murder and put on trial.

programme.title: Renegade Girl
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, whose family is allied with the notorious William Quantrill, turns outlaw to revenge herself on a renegade Indian who killed her brother.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E25-28
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Cjamango
programme.desc: Just when Cjamango has won a bag of gold in a poker game, he is attacked by the gangs of El Tigre and Don Pablo.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: In 1906, on Oklahomas Indian lands, a cowboy fights for oil lease rights against a greedy oilman while a pretty schoolteacher steals both mens hearts.

programme.title: Spencers Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Join charismatic chef Spencer Watts at his glorious rooftop patio for a one-hour special featuring a full holiday spread, all made on the BBQ. Spencer’s festive menu is all about creative BBQ twists with his delectable, mouth-watering recipes including Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie, and Asparagus with Smoked Salmon Dip. Save room for the piece de Q-sistance: Smoked Turkey Two Ways. This year, take your holiday feast outside and serve up something deliciously different.

programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing international menu! Josh makes dishes from Thailand while Erica prepares a South Korean meal!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser thats easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on salty, funky sauces! First up, a gorgonzola-prosciutto-orange wine pasta sauce! Next, a grape and olive tapenade to go with quail and sauce brandade for potatoes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on sweet sauces! First up, a grown-up sundae with classic chocolate sauce! Next, a caramelized onion soubise for pork chops and a traditional sweet and sour chicken sauce!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on bitter sauces! First up, a duo of chimichurris - one with black garlic! Next, a stout and espresso gravy for lamb and a traditional Georgian walnut sauce!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on fatty sauces! First up, patatas bravas with aioli and brava sauce! Next, classic sauce choron on crab cakes and a duck fat-blood orange emulsion with duck confit!

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: Spices were meant to be used in tandem, and our co-hosts Jasmin Ibrahim and Shahir Massoud will show you how! Cook along as they make a creamy, golden, Risotto Milanese, spiced not just with saffron, but with Ras el Hanout: a spice blend like no other! Next, a master class in spice blends and infusing them into oils, all topped off with some skewers of plump, juicy grilled shrimp. Finally, delicate Red Snapper is coated in aromatic Dukkah and served with a fresh Tomato and Chickpea Salad!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencers "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isnt finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencers tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni Skhug hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-masters social feed is meat on a stick - and Chef Spencers Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! Next up is the creative Tornado Potato which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: "A" is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin picks the letter “D” in this challenge and combines two very different ingredients – dill and duck! But that’s no big dill for Theresa. For her first dish, Theresa uses dill seeds and weed to make a hearty, creamy dill pickle soup. She adds chicken broth and potatoes as her base but makes the soup extra smooth with some sour cream. She tops the soup with dill pickles to add a delightful crunch. Next, Theresa takes duck, a classic French ingredient, and gives it a French Canadian twist – duck tourtière. Using the duck fat to fry up some veggies, she adds red wine to her chicken stock and simmers the meat. Then, Theresa fills a pie crust with this delightful duck...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Showcasing the unique flavours of endive and eggplant, Chef Lauren Gulyas receives the letter "E" for her cooking challenge. She sets sail by creating an endive salad boat, the perfect delivery vessel for her smoked trout with creÌ€me fraiche, and goat cheese with walnut appetizers. She follows up with a stuffed baby eggplant, Moroccan style! Chef Lauren sauteÌs onion and garlic with some smoky sweet paprika and a snip of savoury sage, the aromatic combination lends itself beautifully to the succulent flavour of lamb. For her grand finale, Chef Lauren prepares the pieÌ€ce de reÌsistance using both endive and eggplant.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Its all about the letter "S" as Chef Robert Jewell cooks up tasty meals using shrimp and sausage. For his first recipe, Robert fries up turmeric-spiced sweet potato fritters with a shrimp centre. He takes this tantalizing appetizer to another level with a savoury lime soy dipping sauce. Next up, Robert makes an English breakfast strata. This sausage casserole is easily the BEST way to start your day. He layers the bottom of the dish with buttered sourdough slices, before adding crispy fried sausages, leeks and tomatoes. He then covers it in a creamy egg mixture, crumbles stilton on top and bakes it to golden brown. Finally, Robert combines shrimp and sausage into one flavourful dish.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Appreciating island culture, host Michael Bonacini explores the enchanting region of Sardegna and its exceptional cuisine. Michael begins his island feast with a taste of the sea through his seasoned antipasto of Stuffed Snails. Next, Michael prepares a luxurious and delicate Lobster Spaghetti, highlighting the fresh seafood of the region. Moving inland for his secondo, Michael cooks up a traditional dish of Lamb with Artichokes and Saffron, a meal that combines three of Sardegnas most famous ingredients. To end his meal, Michael combines salty and sweet with a dolce of Honey and Cheese Fritters.

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs

programme.title: One World Kitchen

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Endearing host Vanessa Gianfrancesco whips up a traditional Italian four-course meal.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Lovely host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us how to make two of the most popular Japanese foods at home: sushi and tempura.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Cheerful host Vijaya Selvaraju shows us just how easy Indian dishes can be incorporated into everyday meals.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides and Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser thats easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on salty, funky sauces! First up, a gorgonzola-prosciutto-orange wine pasta sauce! Next, a grape and olive tapenade to go with quail and sauce brandade for potatoes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on sweet sauces! First up, a grown-up sundae with classic chocolate sauce! Next, a caramelized onion soubise for pork chops and a traditional sweet and sour chicken sauce!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on bitter sauces! First up, a duo of chimichurris - one with black garlic! Next, a stout and espresso gravy for lamb and a traditional Georgian walnut sauce!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on fatty sauces! First up, patatas bravas with aioli and brava sauce! Next, classic sauce choron on crab cakes and a duck fat-blood orange emulsion with duck confit!

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Baking host Jessica McGovern warms up the kitchen with some melty, creamy, and chewy treats to comfort you on a rainy day.

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: Spices were meant to be used in tandem, and our co-hosts Jasmin Ibrahim and Shahir Massoud will show you how! Cook along as they make a creamy, golden, Risotto Milanese, spiced not just with saffron, but with Ras el Hanout: a spice blend like no other! Next, a master class in spice blends and infusing them into oils, all topped off with some skewers of plump, juicy grilled shrimp. Finally, delicate Red Snapper is coated in aromatic Dukkah and served with a fresh Tomato and Chickpea Salad!

programme.title: Barbarian
programme.desc: Detroitiin tyohaastatteluun saapuva nuori nainen vuokraa asunnon kayttoonsa. Kun han saapuu keskella yota, han huomaa, etta talon on varannut joku muukin, outo mies, joka on jo paikalla. Han paattaa kuitenkin jaada, ja saa pian huomata, etta paikassa on jotain paljon pelottavampaakin kuin vain odottamaton vieras.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

programme.title: Murha vailla syyllista
programme.desc: Vuonna 1924 mediamoguli William Randolph Hearst kokosi joitain maailman tunnetuimmista persoonallisuuksista jahtinsa matkalle, joka johti viela ratkaisemattomaan, hiljaiseen murhaan.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: DAREDEVIL (Ben Affleck), katujen armoton oikeudenpuolustaja, rakastuu kauniiseen taistelulajitaituri Elektraan (Jennifer Garner). Elektra perheineen joutuu haijyn palkkamurhaajan maalitauluksi ja DAREDEVILin on kohdattava tosiasia: han saattaa menettaa ainoan rakkautensa.

programme.title: Kielletty Intohimo
programme.desc: Kun nuoren parin kotiin yritetaan murtautua, he soittavat poliisille, kuten kuka vain tekisi. Silloin he tapaavat losangelesilaispoliisi Pete Davisin, jonka huolehtivaisuus ihastuttaa. Han ottaa asiakseen taata pariskunnan turvallisuuden ja alkaa partioida heidan tontillaan. Mutta ystavallisyys muuttuu vahitellen kieroutuneeksi pakkomielteeksi, kun Davis tunkeutuu yha syvemmalle pariskunnan elamaan. Alkaa painajainen, jossa suojelijasta tulee saalistaja. Pariskunnan taytyy jotenkin paasta pakoon turvaverkkoa, josta on tullut heidan vihollisensa.

programme.title: Tristan and Isolde
programme.desc: Sodan erottamat Tristan ja Isolde joutuvat pitamaan tunteensa kurissa rauhan ja Englannin tulevaisuuden takia. Mutta mita enemman he kieltavat tunteensa, sita vahvempina ne vellovat....

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: Viides Valta
programme.desc: He perustivat vallanpitajia hatyyttavan nettisivun ja heista tuli maailman jahdatuimpia ihmisia. WikiLeaksin perustajat Julian Assange ja Daniel Domscheit-Berg saivat haltuunsa kaikkien aikojen suurimman maaran luottamuksellisia ja vuodettuja tietoja Yhdysvaltain puolustusministeriosta. Silloin kaynnistyi sisainen taistelu. Paljonko kannattaa maksaa vapaan maailman suurimmista salaisuuksista? Mita niiden paljastaminen maksaa?Daniel Domscheit-Bergin oma kirja WikiLeaksista on pohjana aidolle trillerille, joka kertoo aikamme keskustelluimmasta ja ristiriitaisimmasta organisaatiosta WikiLeaksista ja sen perustajasta Julian Assangesta.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Legacy of lies
programme.desc: Kovaotteinen ovimies Martin Baxter tienaa lisatuloja osallistumalla laillisuuden rajamailla pyoriviin taistelulajikisoihin. Takana on ura MI6:n agenttina, jonka han jatti Kiovassa sattuneen katastrofin takia. Mutta menneisyydellahan on taipumusta loytya edesta hanen ammatissaan. Kun Baxter saa tilaisuuden selvittaa, mita Kiovassa tuona kohtalokkaana iltana tapahtui, han tarttuu siihen.

programme.title: Shes The Man
programme.desc: Viola Hastings (Amanda Bynes) kuulee kauhukseen, etta tyttojen futisjoukkue lopetetaan. Kun portti poikien joukkueeseen ei muuten aukea, Viola paattaa esiintya veljenaan Sebastianina, jonka oleskelu Lontoossa venahtaa. Mutta pojan rooli ei olekaan ihan helppo vetaa, etenkaan kun kamppiksena on sopo Duke (Channing Tatum), joka tosin on ihastunut kauniiseen Oliviaan (Laura Ramsey), joka puolestaan ihastuu herkkaan uuteen poikaan Sebastianiin... Elokuva perustuu kevytjuustoakin loysemmin Shakespearen Loppiaisaattoon.

programme.desc: A woman miraculously survives three gunshot wounds to the head.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Crusty mechanic Chuck leads the scramble to ready the Electra for a disaster relief mission in Haiti, but fates curveball sends them to the High Arctic instead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.desc: The historic four truck convoy faces fire and a crossing so thin.
