programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Chasing the Sun S2 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Explore a place where its illegal to be a tattoo artist and the people in a rapidly changing culture. A place where a GPS limitations mean the possibilities to get lost in music and art are endless.

programme.title: Ancient forests of Tsitsikamma
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Ancient forests of Tsitsikamma"
programme.desc: Xander takes full advantage of the opportunities given to him by experiencing all that Tsitsikamma has to offer, whether that be bungee jumping, quad biking, or visiting a 60’s diner.

programme.title: The Animals of Oudtshoorn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Animals of Oudtshoorn"
programme.desc: Xander starts his day by receiving a surprising phone call from Adam before heading to Chandelier Game Lodge to visit Africa’s most exquisite animals.

programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Quest S1 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Follow Bill as he tours a medieval aristocrats massive fortress that mirrors the Forbidden City. From giant burial mounds, to new Olympic sites, to still moving food, join Bill as he finds the soul of this modern ancient country.

programme.title: Yap
programme.desc: The craziest dive though is when he feeds dozens of sharks with no protective gear. Trying to top that on land, Bill makes a mind blowing deal with a local chief to film where no one has filmed before…The Forbidden Island.

programme.title: Re-live
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave re-live some more of the highlights from their incredible 6000km journey.

programme.title: Experimental Test Pilot
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Breaking the Day S1 - "Experimental Test Pilot"
programme.desc: Test pilot Elliot Seguin is ramping up to the first flight of his latest project.

programme.title: Free Diver
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Breaking the Day S1 - "Free Diver"
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with a painful and debilitating disease, Stig Pryds found treatment in the sport of free diving.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 Wardens S5 - "Above and Beyond"
programme.desc: Wardens often go the extra mile to investigate a report of illegal activity, help a hunter or protect landowner rights. This week Wardens go that extra mile with an unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Backpacking Quebec – Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Epic Trails S3 - "Backpacking Quebec – Part 2"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson backpacks along the spectacular Saguenay Fjord, before setting out on a paddling adventure in Quebec’s Laurentian mountains.

programme.title: Backpacking Quebec – Part 3
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Epic Trails S3 - "Backpacking Quebec – Part 3"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson battles the elements while backpacking during an early season snowstorm in Charlevoix, and then gets his adrenaline pumping with a whitewater run down the mighty Ottawa River.

programme.title: New Zealand
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Epic Trails S3 - "New Zealand"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores the stunning backpacking trails around Mount Taranaki and Mount Hikurangi on New Zealand’s North Island.

programme.title: The Gift of Friendship
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Friendship"
programme.desc: After arriving in Argentina Leon stays with a homeless family. He makes a splash bungee jumping and meets a Haitian student with a selfless heart.

programme.title: Semi Final
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Semi Final"
programme.desc: Four teams face off in the semifinal. First, teams whip up a seafood feast to impress acclaimed chef Tom Hishon (Kingi, Orphans Kitchen, Daily Bread). Then the bottom two teams cook to save their bacon in the ultimate test of simplicity – cooking the perfect steak for a surprise guest judge. Who will make it to the final?

programme.title: Up with the Gods
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Up with the Gods"
programme.desc: Mario teams up with good friend and precision rifle expert Bernard and heads into the high alpine mountains above New Zealand’s rugged West Coast in search of tahr. Drawing on his Greek roots, Mario cooks a rustic “Kleftiko” dish in an earth oven.

programme.title: Outback Odyssey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Outback Odyssey"
programme.desc: Mario Kalpou travels to the outback desert of Australia in search of feral camels that have been running rampant. With a bow in hand and scorching heat he explores the Great Dividing Range, hoping to harvest one of these middle eastern based beasts.

programme.title: Volcanic Kingfish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Volcanic Kingfish"
programme.desc: Mario hooks up with old friend and current world record holder for kingfish Rick Pollock. They fish the coast of New Zealand just off a live Volcano, then tragedy strikes. After the Volcano erupts Mario prepares an amazing ceviche dish.

programme.title: It is what it is..
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "It is what it is.."
programme.desc: Team Indiana, the underdogs of Ultra 4, take the fight to the enemy.

programme.title: Blood, Sweat and Gears
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "Blood, Sweat and Gears"
programme.desc: Handsome Jay Callaways racing career is on the line in one of the toughest technical East Coast race of the series.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "The Outsider"
programme.desc: Wayland Campbell and Levi Shirley go head to head leading to the championship but there is an outsider Randy Slawson, 2 time champion to never under-estimate.

programme.title: All for Bike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Inside Moto S1 - "All for Bike"
programme.desc: Sacrifices are found on the path to success: from Yonny Hernandez’s self-exile, to the serious injuries that Doctor Villamor has to treat.

programme.title: Iceberg Alley, Newfoundland, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Iceberg Alley, Newfoundland, Canada"
programme.desc: Flying a bush plane to the far-reaching tip of the ‘Rock’, the brothers are back in the rugged, isolated island where they were born. Via kayak, the brothers paddle from fishing port to fishing port before reaching their ultimate destination.

programme.title: Nicolett Szanto
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Nicolett Szanto"
programme.desc: Hungarian Gymkhana Champion Nikolett Szanto is one of the sport’s few professional drivers. Balancing racing career with her day job is just one of the many.

programme.title: Dmitrij Sribnyj
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Dmitrij Sribnyj"
programme.desc: Dmitrij Sribnyj reveals his story for the first time from his evacuation during the 1986 Chernobyl nuclear disaster to becoming a 4-time Gymkhana Grid champion.

programme.title: Luke Woodham v Adam Elder
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Luke Woodham v Adam Elder"
programme.desc: 3-time rear wheel drive Gymkhana Grid champion Luke Woodham is defending for a fourth title. His biggest rival Adam Elder is doing everything he can to win.

programme.title: Magical Bones: Black Magic Live
programme.desc: Magical Bones: Black Magic Live features 60-minutes of action-packed illusion and magic performed live, all culminating in a death-defying escapism stunt filmed on the River Thames by the iconic Tower Bridge.

programme.title: Southern Bluefin Tuna Epic
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Southern Bluefin Tuna Epic"
programme.desc: After hearing reports of massive schools of southern bluefin tuna out of Milford Sound, Tim, Jordy, Kieran, Sam and Dave saddle up and try their luck, but a gear malfunction right in the heat of the moment threatens to seriously burst their bubble.

programme.title: Semi Final
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Semi Final"
programme.desc: Four teams face off in the semifinal. First, teams whip up a seafood feast to impress acclaimed chef Tom Hishon (Kingi, Orphans Kitchen, Daily Bread). Then the bottom two teams cook to save their bacon in the ultimate test of simplicity – cooking the perfect steak for a surprise guest judge. Who will make it to the final?

programme.title: Norway / Croatia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Epic Exploring S1 - "Norway / Croatia"
programme.desc: Josh and urban exploring-legend Steve Duncan travel to the arctic island of Spitsbergen, Norway, where there is an old Soviet mining town waiting to be explored. Meanwhile Cody explores the dark and cruel history of Goli Otok prison in Croatia.

programme.title: Namibia / Albania
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Epic Exploring S1 - "Namibia / Albania"
programme.desc: Cody is in Namibia following in the footsteps of German diamond seekers hearing stories of thieves and smugglers. Josh is in Albania and finds abandoned fighter jets and a secret factory.

programme.title: Fukushima
programme.desc: The final episode reunites Josh and Cody after months of travelling separately, this time to the nuclear disaster area of Fukushima in Japan. Meanwhile, they look back at their adventures and reveal the result of their rankings of locations.

programme.title: Terry Down Under
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Terry Down Under"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry start off the new season testing one of the most requested films, Quigley Down Under. Terry will see if he can hit a 564-yard shot with a Sharps rifle. An 800-yard shot, trying to kill 2 bad guys with 1 bullet!

programme.title: Bond, Terry Bond
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Bond, Terry Bond"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry will be testing the effectiveness of driving a vehicle with fully automatic machine guns mounted to the car! Just like 007 did with his Aston Martin DB5.

programme.title: Just-Terry-Fied
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Just-Terry-Fied"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry will be test 2 scenes from Justified where, Terry, aka Raylan Givins finds himself in a bathtub and a dead body lying over top of him.

programme.title: Dubai
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 The Travel Bug S3 - "Dubai"
programme.desc: Morgans in Dubai, an urban giant, with the Arabian Desert on one side and the Persian Gulf on the other. It’s a city of excess, with the world’s biggest building, biggest mall and numerous other man made wonders that will blow your mind.

programme.title: Atv Nightmare
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Fight to Survive S2 - "Atv Nightmare"
programme.desc: A father and son camping trip turns into a desperate fight to survive when John Sloot is crushed under an ATV. Now his 10 year-old son, Cody must brave the wilderness alone to get help.

programme.title: Trapped In A Glacier
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Fight to Survive S2 - "Trapped In A Glacier"
programme.desc: While hiking alone deep in Glacier National Park, Ted Porter plummets into an icy glacial crevasse. With a broken back and miles from anyone, he must fight to survive.

programme.title: Tiny Dancer Strikes Again!
programme.sub-title: S16 : E05 Graveyard Carz S16 - "Tiny Dancer Strikes Again!"
programme.desc: Mark illuminates the ultra-rare option of Mopar sunroofs, while the team tackles the task of restoring a real M51 power sunroof 1969 Charger R/T SE sunroof.

programme.title: “Yeah, its hopped up to over 160”
programme.sub-title: S16 : E06 Graveyard Carz S16 - "“Yeah, its hopped up to over 160”"
programme.desc: The 1970 Challenger, Vanishing Point tribute car is back! A major dream project for Mark is the creation of a series of Alpine White, 1970 Dodge Challenger R/T, tribute cars modeled after the iconic Mopar featured in the film “Vanishing Point”.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel: The Renovation Diaries
programme.desc: The owner of Kestrel Beer buys an original 1930’s Riley Kestrel, with the intention of restoring it and then breaking the land-speed record. This documentary follows the events from restoration to record day.

programme.title: Time for Fear
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 No Time To Lose S1 - "Time for Fear"
programme.desc: This week, the contestants face a scary hospital hunt. They are tested during a dump cart race and a get together with Soweto locals in a group photo challenge.

programme.title: Time for the Maze
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 No Time To Lose S1 - "Time for the Maze"
programme.desc: This week’s episode contains a Pac-Man maze hunt, with a surprising twist. A new height’s challenge tests some contestant’s fear once again.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "First Blood"
programme.desc: Todays couples are Craig and Michael from England. Their opponents are Ruby and Hieu, from The United States.

programme.title: The Well
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Well"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Julian and Leon from England and Chiara and Maïte, from Italy and Luxemburg.

programme.title: The Pentagram
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Pentagram"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Martin and Alexander from Sweden and Merel and Eduardo from the Netherlands. Which of these couples will escape the castle?

programme.title: A Storm is Coming
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Living Stone S1 - "A Storm is Coming"
programme.desc: Following instructions on how to survive in the African wilderness, five couples begin their unforgettable journey.

programme.title: Its Just too Much
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Living Stone S1 - "Its Just too Much"
programme.desc: The couples start their brutal first hike in the middle of the Makgadikgadi Saltpan with only the clothes on their back and two small tents that sleep 5 each.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: With one couple already dropping out, the others continue their hike through Botswana’s wilderness, slowly becoming aware of their ordeal.

programme.title: Eagle Hunter
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Breaking the Day S1 - "Eagle Hunter"
programme.desc: Eagle hunter Sailau Jarih must face the decision to end a chapter in his life and give up eagle hunting, or to carry on and continue the ancient tradition.

programme.title: Perceiberos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Breaking the Day S1 - "Perceiberos"
programme.desc: In Northern Spain, there is a 40-mile stretch of coastal waters known as Costa da Morte or “The Coast of Death”. It is home to the percebeiros, fisherman who collect one of the most coveted delicacies on the planet.

programme.title: Saddle Bronc Rider
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Breaking the Day S1 - "Saddle Bronc Rider"
programme.desc: Kaila Mussell is the only professional female bronc rider in the world. In 2014, Kaila broke her neck during a competition. She has not competed professionally since and will return to the professional circuit for the first time in two years.

programme.title: Thrill Kill
programme.desc: In 2012 The small community of Whitefish Montana was shocked by the useless killing of over 20 deer. Region 1 Wardens think outside the box to put a stop to this heinous crime.

programme.title: Invasive Species
programme.desc: Protecting Montana Waters from Aquatic Invasive Species is a top priority for Montana FWP. But when AIS check stations are set up in Region 1 and 3 its up to the Wardens to educate the public.

programme.title: Axel and Chains
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Wardens S5 - "Axel and Chains"
programme.desc: When Wardens respond to a call sometimes getting there is most of the battle. And we pay tribute to an honorary warden that will truly be missed.

programme.title: Night Goggles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Night Goggles"
programme.desc: Today, the teams will be challenged to do 2 assignments. And one of the challenges will be even harder than we have seen till now.

programme.title: Boat Rowing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Boat Rowing"
programme.desc: In this episode the challenge will be on water. The remaining 5 teams have to row a fishermen boat. The catch however is, the way they have to do this.

programme.title: Canyon Run
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Canyon Run"
programme.desc: Today they have to face another mind blowing challenge. Our teams have gathered themselves on the top of one of the most beautiful hidden canyons in Indonesia.

programme.title: The Gift of Kindness
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Kindness"
programme.desc: Leon drives to ‘The bottom of the world’. He remembers everyone that helped him along the way as he gives back one more special gift….

programme.title: Mountain Monsters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Mountain Monsters"
programme.desc: Mario is on the search of the outer limits of the mountains to find himself a monster red deer. His arrow successfully finds a big red and he showcases some recipes he learnt from the southern regions of Italy.

programme.title: Boars and Prehistoric Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Boars and Prehistoric Fish"
programme.desc: Mario returns to his homeland in Australia to help a friend out, but drama strikes and Mario finds himself in crocodile infested water plucking fish out with his bare hands.All these delicious bush treats are prepared in a termite oven made by Mario.

programme.title: Birds of a Feather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Birds of a Feather"
programme.desc: Mario enjoys the camaraderie and challenge of duck hunting on opening day and then teaches the audience how to cook an ancient Chinese recipe with one of the leading chefs of an award-winning restaurant from New Zealand.

programme.title: The Pool
programme.desc: Eighteen contestants are ready to participate in this brand reality game, hosted by Brendan Moar. They have to go over, under or thru the obstacles.

programme.title: The Warzone
programme.desc: With Vivian and Valerya out, Thru continues with the second track. The teams have to follow their path through an old warzone and emotions run high.

programme.title: The Basement
programme.desc: After the emotional exits of Frank and Tung Tung, the competition continues with an Olympic touch. Will team red earn money for their jackpot this time?

programme.title: Japan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Chasing the Sun S2 - "Japan"
programme.desc: Land of the rising sun and the fastest trains in the world that takes us from skateboarding to drag queens and one of the last remaining old-world jazz bars. We meet a chalk artist and a sculpture who makes art with a bite, aka: real teeth.

programme.title: Lake Titicaca, Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Lake Titicaca, Peru"
programme.desc: The brothers hitch-hike from the ancient Inca capitol of Cuzco, down the spine of the Andes Mountains to Lake Titicaca. They suffer acute mountain sickness, get high on coca leaves and meet some locals as they battle their way across the Andes.

programme.title: FISHING IS NOT FAIR
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bottom Feeders S1 - "FISHING IS NOT FAIR"
programme.desc: The desire and competition for catching fish is at an all time high but fishing is anything but fair.

programme.title: STORM IS BREWING
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Bottom Feeders S1 - "STORM IS BREWING"
programme.desc: A distant natural disaster creates uncertainty for all commercial fishing crews in the upper Midwest. Jedd finds a valuable species in his haul but isn’t sure a market exists. Tim races against shifting conditions in hopes of scoring a decent haul.

programme.title: Their Adventure Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Roads End S1 - "Their Adventure Begins"
programme.desc: Two adrenaline junkies that love nothing more than off road adventure motor biking. And they’re off on their most epic journey ever, to Argentina.

programme.title: Broken Bike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Roads End S1 - "Broken Bike"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are pushed to their limits. Fighting through the rough ride across the scorching sand dunes littered with shrubbery Rob is unable to continue.

programme.title: Dive into Marbella
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Dive into Marbella"
programme.desc: Can a family from North Yorkshire run a business in the middle of Europe’s only desert? A car enthusiast pushes to sell spares in France. Two expats launch a dive centre in Marbella.

programme.title: Mauritius Part 1
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Mauritius Part 1"
programme.desc: East Africa beckons and Sashi is answering the call. Sashi is bouncing around the island nation to discover its culinary curiosities; from streetfood to haute cuisine, and everything else in between!

programme.title: Mauritius Part 2
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Mauritius Part 2"
programme.desc: East Africa beckons and Sashi is answering the call. Sashi is bouncing around the island nation to discover its culinary curiosities; from streetfood to haute cuisine, and everything else in between!

programme.title: Bali
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 A Simple Path S2 - "Bali"
programme.desc: Bali, the paradise island of magic. Its about progression at Motion Skate Park, DIY at the Jungle spot, vegan indulgence at Kynd cafe, design for the Hand of God, hot bowl grinds at the Dog Bowl and Loco by Nature and Televisi Star worldwide.

programme.title: Milan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 A Simple Path S2 - "Milan"
programme.desc: 120 Hours in Milan where dreams come true. Connect at Rufus Skate and textured expressions. The global community at Milano Centrale. Candy Coast, try and try again for creative escape. Flying at Lambrate Skate Park, photographic genius and unity.

programme.title: Sango Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Sango Lodge"
programme.desc: Craig joins Kristina at Sango Lodge in the heart of the Save Valley Conservancy where they explore the vast, rugged wilderness. Kristina joins Bryce and his anti-poaching team as they demonstrate the effectiveness of the anti-poaching dog unit.

programme.title: Zam Expeditions and Kangya Pan Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Zam Expeditions and Kangya Pan Camp"
programme.desc: Kristina travels to Mana Pools to experience the wilderness in the dry season. Her guide, Cloud, takes her on an expedition to find lion cubs and wild dog puppies. Richard guides Kristina into her closest encounter yet with a wild bull elephant.

programme.title: Marriage Lows
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Marriage Lows"
programme.desc: Jason experiences insecurity about challenges that the couple are, quite literally, dropped into. From falling out of the sky to a rappel into a dark cave, will the couple be able to work together or will they end up stranded in the dark?

programme.title: You Do What?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Love On The Rocks S1 - "You Do What?"
programme.desc: The couple head to south western Oklahoma to climb at Quartz Mountain, but when Jasons confidence is shaken during a failed slab climb, Tayler realizes she may need to prepare to carry a larger load on their journey out west.

programme.title: The Ice Hotel V Barbados
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jet Set S1 - "The Ice Hotel V Barbados"
programme.desc: In freezing temperatures Gill attempts a Jet Set Victory by sculpting her very own ice cat. Unfortunately it leaves Dave feeling rather scared. Richard attempts to heat up the competition from the Caribbean island of Barbados.

programme.title: Miami
programme.desc: James Lance gets to grips with his Colombian roots while trying to build a career as a Latin hip hop artist. After raising himself as a teenager, he refuses to give up and dreams of a better future.

programme.title: Kushtia, Bangladesh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Kushtia, Bangladesh"
programme.desc: The brothers traverse the country’s interconnecting network of waterways by ferryboat. From shrimp baron, to peasant fishermen, lofty temple ruins to anonymous chai wallahs, they make their way to Kushtia, home to the shrine of Guru Lalone Shaw.

programme.title: Kingdom of Mustang, Nepal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Kingdom of Mustang, Nepal"
programme.desc: Securing special visas, the brothers get 10 ponies and 6 porters and undertake a stunning, but difficult 13-day pony trek over the Himalayas to the valley of Mustang where they will try to have a sitting with the king.

programme.title: Iceberg Alley, Newfoundland, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Iceberg Alley, Newfoundland, Canada"
programme.desc: Flying a bush plane to the far-reaching tip of the ‘Rock’, the brothers are back in the rugged, isolated island where they were born. Via kayak, the brothers paddle from fishing port to fishing port before reaching their ultimate destination.

programme.title: Caving In
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "Caving In"
programme.desc: Moving the leadwood tree is proving to be nerve wracking for Amanda. Back at the building site, the thatch is too heavy for the wooden frames and as a result its bending the door frames. Amanda’s kids are in Zimbabwe for the school holidays.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "The Competition"
programme.desc: Bruce visits Victoria Falls Safari Lodge, to check out the competition and what is on their menu. The Lodge chef shows him how to make their signature Mopane worm dish. At the house, they have a new unwanted visitor, a Mozambican Spitting Cobra.

programme.title: The Elephant In The Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "The Elephant In The Room"
programme.desc: Lyndal and Amanda are at a local market buying some wooden tables for the lodge as well as a few wood statues. Lyndal takes a quiet time out and goes to visit the Victoria Falls. Amanda, Bruce and Mark head into town for a farewell dinner for Bruce.

programme.title: On the Edge in Gans Bay
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "On the Edge in Gans Bay"
programme.desc: While Xander travels to the fishing town of Gansbaai to experience the joys, and horrors, of the sea, Adam experiences a few frights of his own back at home.

programme.title: The Valley of Desolation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Valley of Desolation"
programme.desc: Xander and his team travel to Graaff-Reinet, one of the oldest towns in South Africa, to enjoy food, history, and nature, while Adam spends the day searching for fossils in his hometown.

programme.title: The Dullstroom Highlands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Dullstroom Highlands"
programme.desc: Xander and his team drive eleven hours to Dullstroom, a quaint town where fishing and drinking prevails. Across the pond, Adam’s desire to participate with Xander and his crew takes him all the way to the grocery store.

programme.title: Death of Ego at Kedarnath
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Death of Ego at Kedarnath"
programme.desc: Our first glimpse of the first peak, Kedarnath, the temple of death. Anand reminds us that “What needs to die is part of the ego, fears, and comforts.” Ken thinks people are riding recklessly, Mario takes a spill, injuring his passenger Aizhan.

programme.title: Inner Violence Waiting to Happen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Inner Violence Waiting to Happen"
programme.desc: Ryan puts out prayer flags for the people who helped finance his trip, a stark contrast to the ungrateful Elle caught in blame. Warm day quickly turns cold and many are complaining about wet bedding and frigid conditions.

programme.title: Freedom in the Gap at Tungnath
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Freedom in the Gap at Tungnath"
programme.desc: Emptiness and Power in the Gap. The stunning Tungnath Peak at 13,000 ft, the Feminine Temple above the Masculine. Ken goes from rational doubter to having an experience “beyond understanding” that relates to his deceased sister.

programme.title: Day 4
programme.desc: Jalou and Kevin travel to far colder places to challenge each other in an ice climbing competition.

programme.title: Day 5
programme.desc: In the Chinese desert, Kevin finds out that desert racing is difficult. While in Bolivia, Jalou wants to prove to her brother that women can be better drivers.

programme.title: Day 6
programme.desc: After exploring Peru, Jalou has to get over her fear when she goes white water kayaking. In Thailand, Kevin is feeling the pressure.

programme.title: Camp Amalinda
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Camp Amalinda"
programme.desc: Kristina journeys to Camp Amalinda. Her guide, Dardley, shares some of the history of this World Heritage Site and intriguing rock paintings. They track white rhino on foot and she learns about the distinctive rock formations.

programme.title: Ivory Safari Lodge and Khulu Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Ivory Safari Lodge and Khulu Lodge"
programme.desc: Dardley joins Kristina at Ivory Lodge on the edge of Hwange National Park where her predator sightings just keep getting better. They get unbelievably close to wild cheetah and witness a cheetah hunt. Do the cheetah succeed in what they were after?

programme.title: Kavinga Safari Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Kavinga Safari Camp"
programme.desc: Kristina’s guide, Andy, treats her to wonderful riverbed drives and wild encounters on foot. An eventful night drive leads them into a potential battle as a coalition of 3 foreign male lions step into the resident king’s territory!

programme.title: Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula"
programme.desc: Champion spear fisherman, Julian, takes Piri spear fishing and into the bush chasing pigs.

programme.title: Hawkes Bay
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Hawkes Bay"
programme.desc: Padre takes Piri to the river mouth fishing for kahawai. Plus we follow the dugs in search of wild pigs.

programme.title: Mahia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Mahia"
programme.desc: Piri heads to Mahia to hit the ocean in search for kingfish with his guide, Justice. Later he goes diving for sea urchins and crayfish.

programme.title: Kaikoura
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kaikoura"
programme.desc: Piri travels to Kaikoura on the east coast of the South Island. Jaye takes Piri for an easy dive, and then the pair travel up into the hills to search for wild deer.

programme.title: Know Pain, Know Gain
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Know Pain, Know Gain"
programme.desc: Failed rock climbing, failed training...struggling marriage? When everything seems to have gone wrong on their road trip in Oklahoma, Tayler and Jason are faced with the question..."are we biting off more than we can chew?" as they head to Wyoming.

programme.title: Trust Me!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Trust Me!"
programme.desc: Jason has attempted to climb the Grand Teton, located in Wyoming, three times before the couples adventure out west. Will the fourth time be a charm, or will lifes unplanned moments present even greater challenges than Jason anticipated?

programme.title: Hells Revenge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Hells Revenge"
programme.desc: After climbing the Grand Teton, the couple head to Utah where a change of plans has them trading in their climbing shoes for an ATV. They take on Hells Revenge, a 4x4 trail only recommended for extremely experienced drivers...which they are not.

programme.title: Thessaloniki
programme.desc: Cody goes off the beaten path in Thessaloniki, Greece. He runs over wagons at a train cemetery, explores a factory with drones and dives to a shipwreck.

programme.title: Ruhr District
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Epic Exploring S2 - "Ruhr District"
programme.desc: Exploring in the industrial Ruhr District in Germany, Josh discovers abandoned steel and mining factories and experiences a miner’s life underneath the ground.

programme.title: Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula"
programme.desc: Champion spear fisherman, Julian, takes Piri spear fishing and into the bush chasing pigs.

programme.desc: Padre takes Piri to the river mouth fishing for kahawai. Plus we follow the dugs in search of wild pigs.

programme.title: Mahia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Mahia"
programme.desc: Piri heads to Mahia to hit the ocean in search for kingfish with his guide, Justice. Later he goes diving for sea urchins and crayfish.

programme.title: Kaikoura
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kaikoura"
programme.desc: Piri travels to Kaikoura on the east coast of the South Island. Jaye takes Piri for an easy dive, and then the pair travel up into the hills to search for wild deer.

programme.title: Fourni
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Fourni"
programme.desc: In episode six I’ve arrived in Fournoi. It’s a gorgeous slice of Greece, hidden between Ikaria to the west and Samos on the northeast.

programme.title: Ikaria
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Ikaria"
programme.desc: In this episode I’m finishing my visit to Ikaria by spending time meeting some of the locals.

programme.title: Barbados and Lake Como
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Barbados and Lake Como"
programme.desc: From Barbados to Lake Como this episode is all about fabulous food and famous visitors.

programme.title: Borneo
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Borneo"
programme.desc: Scotty gets in touch with his ancestral roots and David gets a new friend in Borneo.

programme.title: South Africa, Fiji
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 A Taste of Travel S4 - "South Africa, Fiji"
programme.desc: Scotty is in beautiful South Africa, searching for the Big 5. Carolyne explores the wonderful ancient city of Rome. Lynton heads to the hills of Fiji and is rewarded with an amazing surprise. And Susannah is in the Big Apple, New York.

programme.title: Houston
programme.desc: Jamie Hancock was raised in Houston’s South Park area, a place notorious for gang violence, but also where hip hop artists created a new sound. Today, a new positive message is being created by people like Jamie through music.

programme.title: LA
programme.desc: In LA, we hike with wolfs, Ayurveda insights with Jay and a delicious meal from Karla. Marilia takes an adventurous leap from an airplane, showing the freedom in extreme sports.Tracy showcases the joy of pursuing passions with WCMX at the skate park.

programme.title: Maui
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Maui"

programme.title: Family Values
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Family Values"
programme.desc: A new generation of female chargers band together to compete in a unique big wave surfing ‘expression session’ on the north shore of Oahu.

programme.title: Skullbase
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Skullbase"
programme.desc: The Walsh twins reveal why water safety crews and rescue teams are the unsung heroes of big wave surfing.

programme.title: Conservation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Conservation"
programme.desc: In this episode Andi and Chelsey learn to dive, this becomes a vital skill for later in the show. This is the first time the girls are exposed to the threats of the ocean…

programme.title: Swimming with Whales
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Swimming with Whales"
programme.desc: The girls meet up with Dr Andrea Marshal and head out on an ocean safari. This is their most epic nautical adventure yet!

programme.title: Luxury Resorts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Luxury Resorts"
programme.desc: The girls visit some of Mozambique’s most exclusive resorts and they do it in style. Andi and Chelsey compete in an ocean challenge for the ultimate prize, one night’s stay in the five star Flamingo Bay.

programme.title: Switzerland
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 A Simple Path S2 - "Switzerland"
programme.desc: Lugano, home of Morel, Oops Bar and The Warriors. To Basel for cheesy potatoes, DIY with Oli and Claudia, Pipoz, Portland Bowl, the president, creative concrete and wood and the Rock n Rollers. Back to The Beast then love underground at Bern Moosweg

programme.title: Berlin
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 A Simple Path S2 - "Berlin"
programme.desc: Berlin beautiful grunge, skate spoons, freestyle analogue,Griefswalder DIY and Skatesencia. Sketistan HQ, positive impact for kids the world over, NBU home of Hera, a space for expression. Place magazine, potato pants album cover prints and Templehof

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 A Simple Path S3 - "New York"
programme.desc: Yann Horowitz delves into NYCs skate scene, visiting shops, meeting legends, and exploring iconic spots. He highlights skateboardings community and inclusivity, expressing affection for the city and the connections forged through his passion.

programme.title: London
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx steps outside of her comfort zone to draw inspiration for her music track from urban youths in London’s Grime scene.

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Amsterdam to influence her music track and discovers it’s a whole lot more experimental than she imagined.

programme.title: Paris
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Paris, the city of love, for inspiration and discovers its diversity and a creative trend called retrofuture.

programme.title: Rotterdam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Rotterdam"
programme.desc: Two European street artists are teaming up in the Netherlands for the ultimate Street Art Challenge but Mother Nature seems to be doing everything to ruin it.

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Two street artists are fusing their styles together in one of the worlds finest cities, Lisbon.The challenge is left hanging by a thread when disaster strikes.

programme.title: Costa Rica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Journey Within S1 - "Costa Rica"
programme.desc: Marilia explores Costa Rica, connecting with nature at Zunya, experiences a cacao ceremony with the Maleku Tribe, and finds wellness in Tamarindos Cala Luna. At La Senda, she learns to appreciate natures beauty and the importance of slowing down.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes off the beaten path as he hikes from one remote village to the next through Fiji’s mountainous landscape.

programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores the world-renowned Abel Tasman National Park by foot, and by sea kayak.

programme.desc: There is no place on earth with such diverse cultures has Papua New Guinea. Bill follows the trail of the legendary headhunters deep into the rainforest only to uncover secrets even more mysterious.

programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Quest S1 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Follow Bill as he tours a medieval aristocrats massive fortress that mirrors the Forbidden City. From giant burial mounds, to new Olympic sites, to still moving food, join Bill as he finds the soul of this modern ancient country.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Back Home S1 - "Vincent Valdez"

programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 A Simple Path S3 - "New Jersey"
programme.desc: Yann delves into New Jerseys skateboarding culture, meeting skateboarders who are into, fashion, horror, comedy, tattooing, and rug-making. He explores NJ Skate Shop and Freedom Skate Park, encountering Fred Gall and Brian Anderson.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for an open container of beer. In Salt Lake City, UT a woman is stunned as to how drug paraphernalia wound up on her person. In Las Vegas, NV a former bus driver relays sad details about his past. In Portland, OR a shoplifter receives some sage of wisdom from one of the officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate goes on a rampage when he suspects police of losing his money. Officers have a tough time with a drunk man. An alleged prostitute is stabbed. A drunk trapeze artist takes a drive on his moped.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Over the course of a single shift, officers are forced to go toe to toe with a hotheaded inmate refusing to change cells without a fight and then must deal with the whims of a homeless man who demands room service and an upgraded jail cell.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a man is sent to a holding cell after hurling racial insults. In Reno, NV A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody for battery of a police officer. In Portland, OR an intoxicated eldery man breaks into song during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies corral a suspect into a cell after serious turmoil. A man becomes suicidal after being brought in on burglary charges. Facing the gavel, a prisoner berates a Judge during court proceedings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an upset inmate damages the door on a patrol car. In Portland, OR a man over-estimates the legal consequences of his actions. In Tacoma, WA a couple charged with domestic violence denies getting physical even though there’s blood in the woman’s hair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. A woman claims she swallowed her friend’s pills for good reason. A family reunion ends with a bruised and bloodied husband.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughters boyfriend, and an inmates negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 In the same League
programme.desc: Booze and a cellphone dispute lead one man to the “green suit.” A couple of panhandlers profess their undying love to each other. Alcohol pushes a proud father across the line. A homeless woman gives officers career advice.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative inmate complicates things. A man charged with DUI complains about the prison food. A security guard arrested for robbery fears that her dream job with Homeland Security is gone.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Headbutts and aggression abound during a jail fight. A young man is arrested after stealing $1,500 worth of hats. Officers discover a suicidal inmate who’s no longer taking his medication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in womens lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man admits to urinating in public. A couple spends their date night in jail after being over served, and a DUI suspect passes out during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A vice unit interrogates several individuals accused of sex crimes. Suicidal threats provoke a high-stakes situation within cell walls. Unable to raise bail, a woman is incarcerated for several days.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Fight For Your Right
programme.desc: A woman is placed into a restraint chair during intake. Punches are thrown and questions are asked after a fight occurs. After dodging a bar tab, a woman is also accused of spiting and biting.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail
